title: The Netsilik eskimo today
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, John Friedman, Francois Seguillon and Gilles Blais
brief_description: This film, made in 1972, shows the life of an Inuit family in the settlement of Pelly Bay inside the Arctic Circle. Under a federal government scheme, permanent heated housing, a school and a store are provided for the community. This film affords a glimpse of the Inuit adaptation to these changed conditions.
